projects.title: Components
projects.description: A collection of simple, reusable components.

projects.title: SF Helper
projects.description: SF Helper is a Visual Studio Code extension designed to streamline Salesforce development by providing quick access to common operations such as deploying, retrieving, running tests, executing anonymous code and managing debug logs.

projects.title: AutoIPO
projects.description: A simple script that automates applying for IPOs or FPOs for lazy people.

projects.title: CardFlow
projects.description: Cardflow is a simple kanban board app with seamless drag and drop support. Built using SvelteKit.

projects.title: PixelText
projects.description: A simple OCR application that uses tesseract.js for image to text conversion.

projects.title: Linux DNS Manager
projects.description: Linux DNS Manager is a simple Python GTK application for managing DNS server configurations. It allows users to add, view, remove and setup DNS server configurations through a graphical user interface.

projects.title: Summarize Wiki
projects.description: This Python application utilizes Streamlit to create an interactive web-based tool for summarizing Wikipedia articles. The application fetches data from Wikipedia using the unstructured library and then utilizes open source models to generate a summary of the provided Wikipedia page.

projects.title: Timer
projects.description: Simple timer built with React and Typescript.

projects.title: Tasks
projects.description: Minimalistic todo application built with svelte, utilizing localstorage.

projects.title: EaseScroll
projects.description: EaseScroll is a simple WordPress plugin that adds a customizable scroll-to-top button to every page on your WordPress site. This plugin allows users to easily navigate back to the top of the page with a single click.
